layout.title: Pricing Table Layout
layout.message: Displays a list of subscription plans in pricing table layout

field.name: id
field.label: Select Category
field.description: Select category which you want to display subscription plans

field.name: recommended_campaign_id
field.label: Recommended Plan ID
field.description: ID of the Subscription Plan which will be marked as Recommended

field.name: plan_ids
field.label: Plans
field.description: Select the plans which you want to be displayed. If you don't select any plans here, all plans will be displayed

field.name: exclude_plan_ids
field.label: Exclude Plan Ids
field.description: Enter IDs of the plans which you don't want to be displayed on this page, comma separated

field.name: intro_text
field.label: Intro Text
field.description: If you enter some text here, it will be displayed at the top of plans list.

field.name: header_background_color
field.label: Header Background Color
field.description: Choose background color for the header section of the the plans

field.name: price_background_color
field.label: Price Background Color
field.description: Choose background color for the price section of the plan

field.name: recommended_plan_price_background_color
field.label: Recommended Plan Price Background Color
field.description: Choose background color for the price section of the recommended plan

field.name: recommended_badge_background_color
field.label: Recommended Badge Background Color
field.description: Choose background color for the Recommended badge text of recommended plan
